title: Still no response to email change.
body: The email on my account got closed due to inactivity and i want to make a 100dollar rp buy for skins and such. i opened a ticket and yet to get a response. Ive given everything they have asked for. what is taking so long and how do i go about this?

replies.body: I looked into this for you and see you've got two tickets open.  Your ticket has been escalated to our account team to help out with this.  Keep in mind one of the tickets will probably be closed to prevent confusion or any delay in responding.  It's also important not to reply to the ticket until you receive a response, otherwise you may drop back to the bottom of the queue.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
